reasoning: Rare condition with no well-defined population prevalence. Systematic reviews identified only 33 cases from 1996-2006 and approximately 95-98 cases across all literature (1946-2021). Predominantly idiopathic etiology (56% of cases). Estimated as extremely rare with prevalence likely <0.1 per 100k based on case report frequency.
source: Journal of Thoracic and Cardiovascular Surgery 2008, PMC systematic review (clinical characteristics, evaluation, outcomes)
